thread.section_title: La Quinta Inn & Suites Manhattan - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: AVOID AT ALL COSTS
thread.title_full: AVOID AT ALL COSTS - Review of La Quinta Inn & Suites Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Clarke08
title: AVOID AT ALL COSTS
text:
Hotel staff are sneaky, withholding extra funds on your card when they did not receive a voucher from Lastminute.com which was not our problem.
They the charged us Â£120 to use the phone when we should not have been the ones chasing for a voucher that we knew nothing about.
Complained to the company AppleCore and the hotel, they did not care at all.
Very poor customer service and cause us extra stress we did not need.
